hackathon-description-text: Philadelphia HoloLens Hackathon. Details at aka.ms/holohackphilly. In person only.
hackathon-eligibility: Eligible teams must be present physically on the site, and registered for the Devpost to upload their project.
hackathon-requirements: Submit a video of your project working in Mixed Reality.
hackathon-rules:
Must be submitted before the end of the day at 4 PM EST on Tuesday June 27, 2017, from local groups only, and run on HoloLens.
Code of Conduct is clearly posted on signs in the hacking location.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3711 Market St, Philadelphia, PA 19104, USA
hackathon-description-header: Creating apps for the Microsoft HoloLens!
